entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
